title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1386/88 of 20 May 1988 fixing for the 1988/89 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1386/88
of 20 May 1988
fixing for the 1988/89 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1988/89 marketing year, the reference prices for fresh lemons (CN code 0805 30 10), expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- June: 54,59
- July and August: 60,24
- September: 55,48
- October: 49,82
- November to April: 47,15
- May: 47,73.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 May 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
